info.name: Dark Wine - WineHQ and Wine-Staging
info.description: Darkens the WineHQ and Wine-Staging websites. Useful for late night debugging and researching.
info.additionalInfo:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 1.02

Fixed screenshot submission, screenshot list, bug search results, and the Bugzilla footer.

Version 1.01

Changed quoted text from purple to a shade of green.

Version 1

Fixed AppDB landing page being unreadable.

Version 0.992

Fixed text blocks (spans) being white with white text.

Version 0.991 //Can't remember why I'm delaying version 1

Fixed some description text.

Version 0.99

Fixed many instances of bright backgrounds having white text. Namely registry snippets, terminal snippets, code snippets, and headers for comments/searches.

Version 0.96

Fixed Win API Stats being unreadable.

Version 0.95

Fixed AppDB and bug section. They did a website update a few weeks ago and I am still working to get things sorted out.

Version 0.92

Fixed mail background color.

Version 0.91

Fixed style not applying to Wine-Staging urls that begin without "www.".

Version 0.9

Fixed some minor text color issues and white backgrounds.

Version 0.8

Initial version - Lacks forum support.
